title: Unbound XL 2023 winner Kristen Legan talks gravel bike setup, checkpoint strategy, and more
content:
Unbound XL winner Kristen Legan sat down with us to talk about how she overcame the mud, bike problem, bike setup, and more.

Read the full article at Unbound XL 2023 winner Kristen Legan talks gravel bike setup, checkpoint strategy, and more on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
